author: swagata87
body: #### PR description: In EGM HLT producer for cluster shape variables, adding sigmaIPhiIPhi, which is needed in HLT supercluster regression setup. #### PR validation: Ran EGM HLT on DY sample, after merging this branch and checked sigmaIPhiIPhi distributions. This PR is not a backport. Backport is not needed.
title: [EGM HLT] Produce sigma_IPhi_IPhi, needed for regression
